mapper.select: select g.*, t.textbook_name bookName from pmph_group g LEFT JOIN textbook t ON g.book_id = t.id where g.id in ( select DISTINCT group_id from pmph_group_member where user_id = #{id} and is_writer = true AND is_deleted = FALSE ) order by group_name limit #{start},#{pageSize}
